Articles.Content:
Please spare me if there's a quick answer to this.

Spoiler

And the reason I put this in add-ons because vanilla doesn't include Mun eclipses, but scatterer+AVP do 

Can the Mun turn red? I was on the Mun in an eclipse when I relized "Hey, the terrain scatters, my craft, kerbals, flag and Mun dust (not mun) all turn red, but not the actual terrain, I wonder why?" Is there an answer?

 

And is there a possible fix/mod?
